S02n221:2: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān śuddhāvāsopari-gaganatala-pratiṣṭhite sapta-ratna pravibha kta-vicitra-ratna-vyūhe mahā-maṇḍalamāḍe viharati sma ||
S02n221:4: tatra khalu bhagavān bodhisa[t]tvān āmantrayate sma ||
S02n221:5: udgṛhṇīdhavaṃ yūyaṃ kulaputrā imāṃ ṣaṇmukhī-nāma-dhāraṇīṃ sarva-jagad-dhitārthaṃ ||
S02n221:7: saṃsāre saṃsarato yo me kaścid duḥkhā nubhavaḥ sa mā bhūt sa rva samatā'pratisaṃvidita- lakṣa ṇaḥ | [2]
S02n221:8: yaś ca me kaścil laukika-sampatti-sukhānubhavaḥ sa bhavatu sarva-sa[t]tva-sādhāraṇa-pa ribhogaḥ | [3]
S02n221:9: yac ca me kiñcit pāpa-karm[ā]kuśala-mūlaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ tan mā bhūd
S02n221:11: yāni ca me māra-karmāṇi tāni mā bhūvann aparijñātāny anuttarayā parijñayā |[5]
S02n221:12: yac ca me kiñcit pāramitopasaṃhi taṃ kuśala-mūlaṃ laukika-lokottaraṃ vā tad bhavatu sarva-sa[t]tvānām anuttara-jñānaṃ | [6]
S02n221:13: yā ca me vimuktiḥ sā bhavatu sarva-sa[t]tva-vimokṣāya |
S02n221:14: mā ca me bhūt saṃsāre nirvāṇe prati-ṣṭhitatā ||
S02n221:37: yaḥ kaścit kulapu tro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ ṣaṇmukhī-nāma-dhāraṇīṃ triṣ-kṛtvā rātres triṣ-kṛtvā divasya cānuvar (t)
S02n221:40: ||idam avoc d bha gavān ātta-manās te ca bodhisa[t]tvā mahāsa[t]tvā bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti ||
